title: After Disputed Goal, Avalanche on the Cusp of a Stanley Cup Win
description: Players and officials needed an extra moment to realize Colorado had scored in overtime. Now, Tampa Bay trails 3-1 and needs to quickly move on from a goal it believes should not have counted.
dc:creator: Ben Shpigel
media:credit: Mark J. Rebilas/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: The Avalanche celebrating their 3-1 series lead after an overtime goal against the Lightning on Wednesday.
